name: Fancy A Shot
description:
Aim your cue, predict the movement of the balls, and sink all of them with only one try: that is the magic of Fancy Shot! Try your best whip shots, piqués, and force draws: any strategy to win at the pool table.

Are you ready to dominate the pool table? Become the indisputable trick shot master in this fun and tricky game.

With one fancy shot, can you clear two balls from the table? Three? Four, five or even six? As you win more levels, the difficulty increases along with your expertise and dexterity. Fancy Shot is fantastic!
